Key Match Events: Croatia came back from a goal down in the 32nd minute to win 2-1 against Scotland
Croatia almost had a dramatic end to the game with Scotland having the ball in the back of the net with the last kick of the game, only for it to be called back for offside
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Modric captained the side and was impactful throughout the game
Croatia have six points from their first three games in the group and are set to face Poland in their next game on 15th October
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luka Modricâ€™s passing was crisp, helping his side traverse vertically on the pitch
Modric won all three of his tackles, made six recoveries and intercepted the ball six times as well
Others: The game was played on October 12, 2024
The match was a UEFA Nations League group stage game
